name: io.github.momentohq/mcp-momento
description: A simple Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation for Momento Cache.

environment_variables.name: MOMENTO_CACHE_NAME
environment_variables.description: Name of the cache to use

environment_variables.name: DEFAULT_TTL_SECONDS
environment_variables.description: Default TTL for cache entries in seconds

tools.name: get
tools.description: get a key-value pair from the cache

key.description: The key to get from the cache

cacheName.description: The name of the cache to get the value from. Uses the default cache name if not provided.

tools.name: set
tools.description: set a key-value pair in the cache

key.description: The key to set in the cache

value.description: The value to set in the cache

ttl.description: The TTL for the key in seconds

cacheName.description: The name of the cache to set the value in. Uses the default cache name if not provided.

tools.name: list-caches
tools.description: Lists all cache names in your Momento account

name.description: The name of the cache to create

tools.name: delete-cache
tools.description: Deletes a cache and all contained values from your Momento account

name.description: The name of the cache to delete

tools.name: publish
tools.description: publish a value to a topic

cacheName.description: The name of the cache to set the value in. Uses the default cache name if not provided.

topicName.description: The name of the topic to publish the value to. Uses the default topic name if not provided.
